name: Example - validated raster data publication checklist
description: A checklist for publishing validated raster datasets to GeoServer and web applications

checks.name: Validated by approver
checks.description: Data integrity has been verified by a relevant approval agent.
checks.guide: Confirm that this data has undergone the relevant data validation and integrity checks.

checks.name: Updated on data store
checks.description: Ensure the existing data is up to date.
checks.guide: Overwrite the existing data with the updated and validated data, or publish a new version where appropriate.

checks.name: Layer published
checks.description: Ensure that the data is available on Geoserver.
checks.guide: Use the Geoserver application interface and ensure the data is published as a layer in line with the organisational SOP.

checks.name: Style is valid
checks.guide: Ensure that the layer style is correct for the latest data version and that it has been published appropriately.

checks.name: Check permissions
checks.description: Ensure that the layer publication and permissions are set correctly on Geoserver.
checks.guide: Use the Geoserver application interface and ensure the data permissions are set in line with the organisational SOP.
